EmailTemplate.description: DCR-294 Insurer receives email notification confirming that the claimant has submitted reply
EmailTemplate.name: CTP-InsurerReceivesEmailNotificationConfirmingClaimantHasSubmittedReply
EmailTemplate.subject: Additional Information Submitted - {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We acknowledge receipt of additional information in relation to an application for merit review received by the Merit Review Service on {!CaseItem__c.CreatedDate} submitted by {!CaseItem__c.SubmittedByName__c} (Insurer Triager).
If you have any queries, please contact mrs@sira.nsw.gov.au or call us on (02 9284 2284)
. Yours sincerely Merit Review Service
